name: Dislocator
description:
Control Keys
-----------------

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Stun Gun: Z

Speed Boost Gun: X (Limited)

Teleport: C (Limited)

How To Play
-----------------

You are a soldier but you refuse to kill.

You are sent against an army of enemies as a scout unit.

Dislocate as many enemies as possible, break their formations and your main army will finish them off.

Stun them, boost their speed, evade by teleportation, collect resources and carve your way through hordes of enemies.
